attributes.action: bring back national service for school leavers,for at least two years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that national service teaches young people a lot of things but mainly respect.If we had national service the armed forces would not be short of members and the prisons would not be as full as it would knock people into shape.We all hear our grandparents talk about how this and that would not have happened in there days which is true.It would also straighten out all the people who are causing trouble to our society,even on the badlads army anyone who watched the programme could see how it started to straighten out the people who thought they were too tough and liked causing trouble.
